sense.def:
Z besedo
although
začnemo odvisni stavek; v njem navedemo trditev, zaradi katere je glavni stavek videti presenetljiv.

seg.quote: Although he was late he stopped to buy a sandwich.
Gretchen kept her coat on, although it was warm in the room.

sense.def:
Z besedo
although
začnemo tudi odvisni stavek, ki pogosto vsebuje nikalnico
not
in spreminja pomen glavnega stavka ter popravi zgrešen vtis, ki bi ga morda lahko dobili.

seg.quote: I have a lot of my grandfather's features, although I'm not so tall as he was.
